name: Craft iron sword
goal: Craft an iron sword from iron ingots and a stick using a crafting table
notes: The iron sword deals 6 damage (3 hearts) and has 250 durability. It is a solid combat upgrade from the stone sword (5 damage). Requires a crafting table.

steps.title: Obtain iron ingots
steps.details: You need 2 iron ingots. Smelt raw iron or iron ore in a furnace (1 ore -> 1 ingot). See 'Gather iron ingot' recipe for all ways to obtain iron ingots.
checks: Have at least 2 iron_ingot in inventory

steps.title: Obtain a stick
steps.details: You need 1 stick. Craft from 2 planks (yields 4 sticks). Skip if you already have sticks.
checks: Have at least 1 stick in inventory

steps.title: Craft the iron sword
steps.details: Use a crafting table. Place 1 iron ingot in top-center, 1 iron ingot in middle-center, 1 stick in bottom-center (vertically). Recipe: { "recipe": "iron_sword", "count": 1 }.
